amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the International Trade Administration Account by $9 million; increase the United States Trade Representative Account by $1,790,000; and reduce the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Cross Agency Support Account by $17 million in an effort to fully fund the Interagency Trade Enforcement Center (ITEC).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the International Trade Administration Account by $9 million, increase the United States Trade Representative Account by $1,790,000, and reduce the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Cross Agency Support Account by $17 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 261 (Roll no. 202).
